text:
To Deepesh "Hastar" Lall,
Bhai first year me saath lagne se fourth year ke kuch yadgaar pal, sbme tum ek ahm hissa rhe ho. Maximum cheezein to tum likh hi chuke ho to dhora kr lamba nhi kheechunga me....but bhai kuch cheezein hai jo bht miss krunga agr college chla bhi gya to -
i) "Bhai nashta krne jaaye to utha dena na humko".
ii) "bhai kahi bahar nhi jaa rha to tera cycle hum le jaa rhe hai...aate hai shaam tk"
iii) "Chl na nipun, aaj mahole bnate hai raat ko"
iv) "Aaj raat ko wazwaan chlte hai yr....bada din ho gya"
v) "Bhai kuch nhi rkha hai inn sb me...padhai kr or sb aage peeche ghumega tere"
vi)"Bhai sutta hai? chl na fukte hai...aaj raat bhar coding krna hai humko"
vi)"Bhai meri maane to coding start krde abhi se, nhi to end tk aate aate fat jaega tumhara"

Bhai ye sirf lines nhi hai mere liye....emotions hai..ğŸ¥°ğŸ¥°

I still remember....wing me kisi ke saath nightouts mene sbse zyada share kiye hai to wo tere saath..ğŸ˜Š Remember first year me naashta krne aate they student lounge se...Damn I still look for that photos sometime...ğŸ˜£
Apne wing me jitne bhi celebration ya mene maze kiye hai to tu to humesha hi part rha hai usme....chahe wo pehli baar hukka try krna ho, ya holi celebration, ya fests me dance krna....bhai memorable bna diya tumne sb ye..ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
Bhai ab sambhalne ki to kya hi bolo me....but jaah mujhe sbse zyada jarurat lagi kisi se baat krne ki or sahi marg darshan ki....tum hamesha saath rhe ho mere...ğŸ˜‹
LOve advice, life advice, career advice, future planning....jitne bhi discussion hote hai mere...tere sath to hote hi hai atleast ek baar....or bhai jo dil se salah dete ho tum...shukraguzar rahenge humesha uske...ğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜Š
Wing me kabhi akela nhi ruka me....tu to rukta hi tha humesha mere saath...chae wo 2019 ka last mid sem break ho ya fir 2021 ka ye last month....dono hi time akele rhe pr bht maze kiye.....iss ek mahine me to infact saari hade hi paar krdi maze krne ki....bhai iss se acha time spend nhi kr skta tha me tumharre saath aur..ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ¥°

Thanks bhai for everything, making my journey of four years on campus more memorable. I pray and hope ki tere jitne bhi plans hai wo saare successful ho life ke...ğŸ˜Š

Bs issi ke saath ab vida lete hai tumse. All the best bhai. Gyaan to lete hi rahenge tumse ab or apna meme sharing to chlta hi rahega wse insta pr...ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹. Baaki milte rehna.

PS - Coding krenge ab pel ke...oracle ka referral ready rkhna..ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹

Yo roomie!!!!

"Haa bol, call kiya tha? Ohh yr wo mera phone silent tha...bta?" Bhai ko jab bhi phone kro ye to trivial sa hi dialouge ho gya hai....ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„

Again first year me to bs ye pta tha ki hall 2 me koi rochak hai jisne nukkad kiya hai. Uske baad bhai 1st year ka summers play, "set management team ke naam pr essa dosti hua tha apna ki lagta tha ek........." well you know the dialouge..ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ Bhai tu play krke khush nhi tha or me play krke khush nhi tha....to same team me hi they dono wse to..ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„ 
Second year nukkad me Bad cops....bhai apni to glti nhi thi....apn to pura character me hi gye they...ğŸ˜‹ wo baat alag hai wha ke bache wo sb dekhne ke liye ready nhi they...ğŸ˜‚ Bhai Dram eve 1 me ostwal group leader or ek baar yaad hai L20 terrace pr jaakr mimcry kr rhe they sbki, ostwal, anant and you know who ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ 
Thodha aage chlte hai, Rendevous delhi. *sighs*. ek pura memoir ussi jagah ki memories se bhar skta hai.ğŸ˜ From eating pizza paratha to plan eating only the pizza, the trip summed up. Wo bar gye they Harshit ke saath bahar, I don't think wo to kisi ko pta bhi hai..ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ Uss din raat ko India Gate, parathe wali gali aur udhar ki trip. Wo parathe wali gali me ladki se parathe wali gali ka raste puchne wala dare....bhai uss ladki ka reply abhi tk yaad hai mujhe..ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ Wo gol gappe or barf ka gola..usme yaad hoga hi tujhe kya milaya tha...ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Agle din delhi campus me hi Alan or mene pehli baar kiya tha....uss din ke baad hi smjh aa gya tha mujhe ki ab to rockak ki hi sharan me hi rehna hai...ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ meri trip to wahi successful ho gyi thi..ğŸ˜‹
IITR inter IIT wha ki to apni bisleri wali bottle hi yaad aati hai mujhe...ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚uske alawa apna wo Jain Dhaba se pehle wha bar jana...ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ Jaha bhi gye hai apna bar is a constant...ğŸ˜‚
Campus me apn dono blame share krne lag gye they ek time pr to logon ko bigaadne ka....if you remember...ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. In fact, mujhe wo Ramya wala scene bhi yaad aa gya room wala jb isko ghr jaana tha or ye raat ko tere room pr humare saath mehfil me bethi thi....well some sources blame me for that but I totally treat that as self defenceğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Uske baad apna wo college me thodha chota bada sa kaand. Well uske baare me jyada nhi likhunga but I will always remember ki tu lokesh or katiyar khade they uss time mere saath...ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ¥° Bro code!!! 
3rd year me kisi ne single handedly round the year dramatics me chapa hai to bhai wo tuney.....wo Mime ke saath...Big fan bhai..ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
Huhh...*December vibes resurfacing*...Ye wo month ka time tha jisme tum logon ke saath mene mere college ka sbse up or sbse low time dekha tha......Wo 15 din to maano calendar se gaayab hi ho gye they....wo jo routine bna tha apna 15 din ka....bhai really wo itna miss krunga me humesha hi..ğŸ˜£ğŸ˜£ğŸ˜£
Apne aap ko lucky hi kahunga me ki bhai apne ko fir se 1 mahine aane ko mila college or fir se tum logo ke saath kuch time spend krne ko mila.....ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ¥°
Baaki ek baar ye lockdown wgara khatm ho to fir se kahi kabhi mahole bnaenge...ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜Š

Tb tk ke liye vida lete hai tum se IAS sahab!! All the best for your journey bhai!! Duaon me yaad rkhna!ğŸ˜ğŸ˜

Jaipur ki sakrat or nahargarh trip.....both were the days jo shyd hi kabhi bhulunga me...ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
Nahargarh trek se vaapas aana mushkil ho gya tha tera wo alag baat hai..ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚

Kya yr....sb bht jaldi nikal gya time....itna pta hoga ki aage itni kami aa jaegi enjoy krne ki to saari hadein hi bhul jate.....but spent a great time together..ğŸ˜‰ğŸ˜‰ğŸ˜‰

Ab IAS yias bn jao to bhul mt jaana humko.....ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹

All the best bhai.ğŸ¥°

Nipun
author: Nipun  Goyal

text:
Varun Grover, chota jain, varun 'dominating' jain...aur bhi pta nhi kitne naamo se famous personality ko humara Ram Ram....
Bhai jiske saath sbse zyada time spend kiya hai campus me wo shyd tu hi hai....club me jao to tere saath...wing me aao to tere saath....exams ka magne jao to tere saath...ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
First year me to literally me yhi sochta tha ki ye MC insaan hai kon club me....alag hi dominate kr rha hai jise dekho usey hi...ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£ But later I realized ki bhai tuney "Subtle art of not giving a f**k" book ko zyada hi seriously le liya hai...ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
First year ka to mujhe wo Antaragni audtion ka fraud maarna yaad hai bhai....saath me planning ke saath fraud maara tha ek dm..ğŸ¤ğŸ¤
uske baad 1sst sem me SOC471A ki quiz.....wo to alag hi din tha....syllabus puchne gye they quiz ka aur quiz hi de aaye...ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Har midsem endsem me pdhne ke naye naye options explore krna....kabhi lounge kabhi library kabhi cc....ğŸ˜…
Wo teri or luwaria ki choti mini fight...ğŸ˜‚
First year me rat rat bhar poker..ğŸ¤£
Fir second year se to dramatics me memories bnane me busy ho gye apn....uski to kitni hi uncountable memories hai.....dram eve 1, antaragani, inter iit, dram eve 2, orientation....bhai *nostalgia hitting strongly*..ğŸ¤©ğŸ¤©
Bhai dukh ye rahega ki tera vrat na tudwa paaye hum...ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ but jitna humne active kiya hai utna hi tuney passive kiya hoga....ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚  wo december me teri importance bht pta lgi thi ki ek sober bnda bhi hona chaiye grp me....nhi to canteen k jaana bhi mushkil ho jaega....ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Lucknow ki trip bhai apni...ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ Uss se zyada uss din maze nhi kr skte they or apn....ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜› uske baad z-square ke baahar ka street food kanpur me....ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
Ye ek mahine ka volleyball bhai....or wo hall 2 me bhi ghr jaane se pehle....ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
Hall me maano volleyball ka culture sa revive kr diya tha apn ne inn ek mahine me to...ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚

Bhai ab miss to bht krenge college open huye to, fir kabhi ab wesa mahole nhi bn paega....yhi soch kkr mera ab college jane ka mann nhi ho rha *BT vibes resurfacing*...ğŸ˜£ğŸ˜£ğŸ˜£
Koi na....ab kabhi time mila to saath me trip plan krenge....or IITK ka mahole kahi or bhi spread krenge...ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹

Tb tk ke liye alvida! Milte hai jaldi fir kahi lucknow jessi trip ki umeed lete hue..ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
author: Nipun  Goyal

text:
Namaskar president sahab..!!!ğŸ˜
Bhai tu pehla bnada hai jo jaipur ka tha or pehli baar campus me mila tha...uske baad hi me sbse milna start hua tha tere through....ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹ 
Kitni hi memories hai apni to bhai share krne ke liye...jaipur saath me travel krne ki ho yaa event conduction ki yaah HEC elections ki....hall me to first approachable insaan koi tha wing ke alawa to tu hi tha bhai....uske upar se apni branch ka or same hona....ğŸ˜ŒğŸ˜ŒğŸ˜Œ
Pta nhi kitni daaru party saath me ki hai apn ne....or bhai tu alag hi chill type....meri wse hi phati rehti thi...tujhe dekh dekh kr hi thodha chill marna seekha hu me...ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹
Antaragni me gadde uthane se lekar badi badi zimmedariyan uthane tk....bhai sb kiya tune..ğŸ˜
Apni I guess ladai to kabhi nhi hui pr galaxy conduction ke beech me mahole bht baar bn gya tha tera, mera or barwal ka...ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Abhi online sem me to or zyada mze kr liye apn ne....remember how we gave all the papers..ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
Wo chandra ki last party room pr....bhai after that party...I found bros for life..ğŸ¥°ğŸ¥°
bhai apna wo lucknow ka OYO wala kaand.....ohh bhai....abhi bhi hasi aati hai wo yaad kr ke...ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Baaki ab tum to naukari wale ho gye ho...kabhi time mile to milna.....fir se mahole jamate hai lucknow jessa...ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜

Cheers to our everlasting bond!!ğŸ¥°
author: Nipun  Goyal
